attributes.action: translink to lower bus fares and/or raise the age of the half fare limit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned, feel that Translink needs to raise the half fare price on buses/trains. We feel we shouldn't we have to pay a higher fare on  buses/trains in Northern Ireland.We feel that there shouldn't  even be an increase in payment for translink travel as a child takes up the same amount of space on a train/bus seat as an adult.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
